opening_theme: #1: "Umi Tori Ka - Amuri Ver.- (海鳥花 -アムリVer.-)" by Yui Makino (ep 1)
#2: "Yacchaou yo! (やっちゃおうよ!)" by Yui Makino & Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team (アムリ率いる宇宙少女ヴァンアレン隊) (ep 2)
ending_theme: #1: "Yacchaou yo! (やっちゃおうよ!)" by Yui Makino & Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team (ep 1)
#2: "Suzume no Heitai-san (すずめの兵隊さん)" by Michiru Aizawa (Lin, Yunque) & Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team (ep 2)
#3: "Keruto no Umi de Kuyurarula... (ケルトの海でkuyuraruLa...)" by Momoko Saitou & Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team (ep 3)
* Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team = Yui Makino, Michiru Aizawa, and Momoko Saitou.
